description: Try our easy to follow Wok-Fried Broccolini With Tassal Salmon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Wok-Fried Broccolini With Tassal Salmon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large fry pan over medium-high heat. Using 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil, rub over both sides of the salmon. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, skin-side down, for 3 minutes or until the skin is crisp. Turn & cook for a further 2-3 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate, skin-side up & cover loosely with foil. Set aside for 5 minutes to rest.
Meanwhile, heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the remaining oil & Broccolini & stir-fry for 2 minutes until almost tender. Remove to a plate.

Add all the ponzu ginger sauce ingredients to the hot wok & bring to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes until reduced slightly. Return the Broccolini to the wok and stir-fry for 2 minutes until well coated.
Pile the Broccolini & sauce onto serving plates and top with salmon. Sprinkle with sesame seeds, chilli & shallots
